snippet: Buoyed by big payoffs from backing tech firms, the European venture capital firm Index Ventures has raised a new $542 million fund to focus on mobile, financial services and online marketplaces.
abstract: Buoyed by big payoffs from backing tech firms, the European venture capital firm Index Ventures has raised a new $542 million fund to focus on mobile, financial services and online marketplaces.

headline.main: European Tech Start-Ups Pay Off for Index Ventures
